item.description:
Soul Therapy Practitioner Certification Training with Elizabeth Foley
Registration:  Contact Judy at 781-639-1236 or Judy@AHigherBalance.com

 

 

This is a 4 month program, meeting from 10 - 4 one weekend a month. Attendance at all sessions is mandatory. We are giving plenty of advance notice so you can save the dates! 
DATES:  Sept. 8 & 9;  Oct. 13&14; Nov. 17 & 18; Dec. 8 & 9 
Cost    $475.00         (Six spots left)

 

     Discover and align your inner spiritual life with your outer life and  empower yourself and others. This four-weekend self-guided program is limited to 10 people.
    What is the Soul? * Listening and connecting with the Voice of the Soul *Discovering your Soul Age *Understanding the Chakras *7 Rays and How they guide your soul *Basics of spiritual psychology—the 12 life lessons *Soul empowerment lessons for life *Tools for emotional & spiritual healing *Steps to attain mastery and manifest your mission.
    Non-refundable $50.00 deposit required to hold your space. Full payment is due 1 week before the start of the program. No refund will be issued if cancellation notice is received less than one week before start of program.
     Elizabeth J. Foley, EdM, MPH, is the owner of Divine Healing, located in Nashua, NH.  She has taught several programs on angels and spiritual mastery at A Higher Balance. See www.DivineHealing.us./
    For all programs offered at A Higher Balance Healing Center see website www.AHigherBalance.com
item.name: Soul Therapy Practitioner Certification Program--4 weekends
